attributes.action: Direct Train Link between the North West and Norwich
attributes.additional_details:
According to a recent report in the EDP, the DfT are looking into breaking up the direct train line between Norwich and the North West.

More than 4.5 million passengers use the service which directly links Liverpool, Manchester and Sheffield to Norwich.

As a resident of the North West with family in East Anglia and a commercial holiday let in Sheringham I rely upon the link for pleasure and business.

If you agree that the proposal, if implemented, will have a direct impact on the East Anglian economy, then I urge you to sign this petition.
